resources:
Sievere\u0020 Music Player\u0020 Version 0.5\u0020 Jan, 2022\u0020
Tracks\u0020 Playlists\u0020 For You\u0020 Search\u0020 Settings\u0020 Now Playing\u0020 Info\u0020 Rate the App!\u0020 Scan the library\u0020
Hello, Friend!\u0020 It\'s me, the developer. I\'m so glad that you are reading this now. Currently, I am learning Android development and I am getting better day by day. I will try to implement every new and useful thing that I learn. If I want to make this short, Sievere is an app for you, by you! It means you can say what you want to see in future updates so I will start working on it. \u0020 It\'s open-source and you can see how it works. Also, It has a channel on Telegram which posts and suggests some good music for you.\u0020 Don\'t forget to be happy!\u0020 - Mahdi Davoodi\u0020
